III. INVESTIGATION
Rule Code & CCI Rule 400.4158 Discipline
Section (1) A child caring institution shall establish and follow written
Description policies and procedures that prohibit the following forms of
intervention:
(a) Any type of physical punishment including, but not limited to:
(ii) Hitting or striking, throwing, kicking, pulling, or pushing a
youth on any part of their body.
Violation Potential Rule or Statute Violation
Type
Allegation Staff kicked youth’s knee.
Investigation I reviewed intake dated 06/01/2023. It states that on 05/31/2023
at approximately 2:00PM that Staff Person 1 kicked Youth A’s
knee. Youth A admits to punching Staff Person 1 in the chest and
pushing her down and that Staff Person 1 kicked Youth A in the
knee as she was getting up. The incident occurred in the stairwell
and out of camera view. No staff or residents were present to
corroborate what had occurred. Youth A did not sustain any injury
states it hurt yesterday and that he refused medical attention.
Video does show Youth A getting in an argument with another
resident after kicking a bucket of water down the stairs. A
separate staff member intervened to separate the two and there is
no indication that Staff Person 1 was involved. Referral Source
and Case Manager reported no other concerns.
Incident report dated 05/31/2023 was reviewed. It states Staff
Person 1 was called for assistance due to Youth A overturning a
bucket of water in the stairwell. Staff Person 1 approached Youth
A to deescalate him to which Youth A responded with “Get the
(expletive) out of my face before I punch you.” Youth A jumped at
Staff Person 1 who put herself in a protective stance and
instructed him not to do that at which point Youth A punched Staff
Person 1 in the chest. Staff Person 1 raised her arm to block her
chest and called for assistance. Youth A continued to approach
Staff Person 1 and pushed her down in the stairwell as Staff
Persons 2 and 3 approached to assist. Staff Persons 2 and 3
removed Youth A and Staff Person 1 removed herself from the
area. EMS arrived and assisted Staff Person 1 with a swollen
shoulder.
No video was observed as it does not cover the stairwell.
I interviewed Youth A onsite with DHHS Worker on 06/02/2023.
2

He reports accidentally tipping over a mop bucket and that Staff
Person 1 was called over to talk to him. Youth A states Staff
Person 1 was telling him to calm down and that he was telling her
to “Get out of my face” noting that she was standing in front of
him. Youth A states he nudged Staff Person 1 away from him as
he was standing against the wall and that he nudged her again at
which point she fell to the floor. Youth A states that when Staff
Person 1 was on the ground that she kicked him in the shin.
Youth A then states that Staff Person 1 got up from the ground
and walked out of the stairway and that other residents came over
to beat him up. He states other staff were present and walked him
back upstairs for movie-time. Youth A states Staff Person 2 and 3
were present and saw Staff Person 1 kick him. Youth A goes on
to state that Staff Person 1 is “ok” except when she’s in his face.
I interviewed Staff Person 1 onsite with DHHS Worker on
06/06/2023. She reports being employed by the facility for four
years as a direct care supervisor with no disciplinary issues. She
reports responding to assistance as Youth A overturned a mop
bucket of water. She states Youth A was standing in the stairwell
with his back to the wall and she stood in front of him and began
talking to him. She reports Youth A jumped at her and she had to
take a step back at which point Youth A then punched her in the
chest. Staff Person 1 states she called for assistance and that
Youth A then pushed her to the floor and that she was pushing
herself away from Youth A as he was standing over her. Staff
Person 1 states she did not kick Youth A and if she did it was not
on purpose rather that she was trying to move away from Youth A
while on the floor. Staff Person 1 states Staff Person 2 was
present just after she fell to the floor. Staff Person 1 states EMS
was called to the facility to evaluate her condition at time of the
incident and notes she was off the schedule on 06/01-06/02/2023.
Staff Person 1 states she still has a bruise to her left arm.
I interviewed Staff Person 2 onsite with DHHS Worker on
06/02/2023. He reports Youth A left staff’s line of sight and that
he threw something in the stairwell. He heard that Youth A
shoved Staff Person 1 and walked over to assist. Upon
approaching he states he saw Staff Person 1 on the floor and in
the process of standing up. Staff Person 2 states he did not
observe Staff Person 1 kick at Youth A. Staff Person 2 states he
began to redirect other residents away from Youth A as they were
mad at Youth A for pushing Staff Person 1 down.
I interviewed Staff Person 3 onsite with DHHS Worker on
06/06/2023. She reports Youth A was mad, left line of sight, and
3

poured water on the floor. Staff Person 1 approached Youth A
and that he was yelling at her. Staff Person 3 states she did not
see Staff Person 1 get punched or pushed down by Youth A, or
Staff Person 1 kick at Youth A while on the floor though she saw
Staff Person 1 get up from the floor crying and walk out of the
stairwell.
I interviewed Staff Person 4, via telephone, with DHHS Worker on
06/06/2023. He reports entering the stairwell and observed Staff
Person 1 on the floor with Youth A standing over her yelling at her.
Staff Person 4 states he did not observe Staff Person 1 kick at
Youth A when she was on the floor or while in the process of
getting up. He reports Staff Person 1 appeared distraught and
walked out of the stairwell.
I interviewed Youth B onsite with DHHS Worker on 06/06/2023.
He reports hearing yelling and that Youth A hit Staff Person 1.
Other residents entered the stairwell and began fighting with
Youth A for hitting Staff Person 1. He states Youth A bit Staff
Person 2 as he was in the process of separating the residents
from Youth A. Youth B did not report observing or hearing of Staff
Person 1 kicking at Youth A.
I interviewed Youth C onsite with DHHS Worker on 06/06/2023.
Youth C does not remember Youth A pushing him prior to
overturning the mop bucket. He states he heard yelling come
from the stairwell though did not see what was occurring.
DHHS Worker reports no findings.
Analysis It cannot be conclusively determined whether Staff Person 1
kicked Youth A in the knee as he initially alleges as only Staff
Person 1 and Youth A were initially present and there is no video
surveillance of the incident. It is noted that Youth A changed his
allegation to being kicked in the shin rather than the knee during
his interview. Youth A did punch Staff Person 1 in the chest and
push her to the floor requiring EMS attention. Staff Person 1
states she did not kick Youth A and if she did it was not on
purpose as she had fallen and wanted to move away from Youth
A. The initial allegations state Staff Person 1 kicked at Youth A as
she was getting up. Staff entering the stairwell just as Staff
Person 1 was getting up from the floor did not observe her to kick
at Youth A.
Conclusion Violation Not Established
4

IV. RECOMMENDATION
Based on investigative findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable
licensing statutes and rules. It is recommended that the current license status be
continued.
